name: Ultimate Word Search 2: Letter Boxed
description: Ultimate Word Search 2: Letter Boxed takes you into a world of mystery where your task is to locate hidden words in a matrix of letters. Each matrix contain words that wrap around a 3D-cube going left, right, up and down.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Find words that are wrapped around cubes - rotate the word cubes to find all the words and try and get a high score.  Not the best or worst word search game (a word search book is easier) in the world, you get what you pay for in this game and can be confusing at the start.  There's no option menus for anything, no instructions and not even simple labels at the start to see where to click which 'world'.  5/10 Giving negitive feedback, cause no option to recommend yes and no at the same time.
'How could word search be bad' I thought to myself. This is how.
